Reviews.Title: big bang for a little buck
Reviews.Author: Dylan Gibson
Reviews.Content: This laptop is great.  It arrived promptly in perfect condition, and when I booted it up it was easy to see I was going to love it.  I agree with the critical reviews--Windows 8 is the most impractical operating system for a laptop/desktop...it's a drastic shift from the old ways and makes everything so much more complicated than it has to be.  But I won't dock points on the machine that it came installed on for that fact; samsung is just trying to keep with the times.  I plan on installing windows 7 sometime soon if I am able.  back to the point though...This laptop packs a lot of power for just $500, which was my main concern.  I use it to do schoolwork, take notes, and play late-release games and it runs so smooth.  If you care about aesthetics, this thing is so sleek and shiny, trimmed down and easy to tote around.At first I was weary about buying a samsung, because my friend has an i3 samsung and said it overheats frequently.  I have not had that problem with this one in the least bit, and it even has fan control settings that control noise/performance.The speakers leave a little bit to be desired, but it's a laptop--you can't expect much from such a tiny sleek machine.  My only other qualm with this computer is the fact that the caps lock button doesn't have a light on it, so you don't know when you're about to type in caps...in my book,however, that's not the worst problem to have.I especially like the fact that the screen is matte, as opposed to glossy.  It's easy on the eyes and has literally no reflection, and works well in direct light as well.  Same goes for the trackpad--your finger won't get all sweaty and stuck to it while you're trying to navigate around.Besides the capslock button and the speakers (which in my book are very minor drawbacks), this thing is a perfect practical laptop.  It'll get everything you need done and you cannot beat the price for the system specs it sports.  Trust me, I shopped around for a couple weeks before settling on this one.

Reviews.Title: Linux frendly.
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: Pros:  Hardware power (i5+6RAM+750GB)  Linux works with all HW.  1 GB net. Only 100mb on DELL.  Good screen. TN, w/o PWM.  4 USB.  Price.Cons:  Samsung software.  Win 8.

Reviews.Title: Excellent laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Ryan D
Reviews.Content: Really, a very good laptop for the price (sub 700$ and free shipping).  The i5 processor is plenty fast for most typical purposes.  The 6G of memory is equally nice.What I did was to purchase a 128GB SSD to replace the platter hard drive to really give this laptop some speed.  Typical platter based hard drives are a big bottleneck, but I simply won't pay the premium to have them pre-installed at a big markup, so I do it myself.Also, I have to look around to find a screen with a 'Matte' finish.  I really don't understand why so many screens these days are the high-gloss finish with an awful glare.  Matte finish on this is very nice.So far, no problems.  All things considered, the bang for the buck on this laptop is pretty good.  The construction is solid, and the manufacturing looks very good.  If I needed another mid-end laptop, I'd probably get this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: BulletWithYourName "SendingItYourWay"
Reviews.Content: I'm no computer nerd so I'm not going to bore you with specifics because to be honest I don't know a lot about them except for the hardware. What I do know is this computer is FAST, built solid, lightweight, charges fast, holds a charge quite well and does everything we need it to do. Windows 8 was little weird at first but once I got a hang of it it's not much different than other versions you just have to figure out where things are. For the price it's a solid little rig and I wish this was mine instead of the wifes now I'm jealous because I'm stuck with our 8 year old desktop and she can walk all around the house and do everything plus more than I can. Yes, she loves it too but I should have bought it for myself. :-)Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: ANNE A ANDRADE
Reviews.Content: Great notebook. Windows 8 is a little different, but once you get used to it, you'll be fine. I had to google how to turn the computer off!

Reviews.Title: Good Computer
Reviews.Author: V. J. Ribaudo "MRGDGT"
Reviews.Content: This is a good computer for the money. Windows 8 is very interesting to learn but once you do,it is very easy.  The only short coming I have found is the camera.  It is advertised as 1.3 MP but it only shows up a as .9 MP.  Images are very grainy.

Reviews.Title: Great computer, but Windows 8 sucks
Reviews.Author: Claude Kuffskie
Reviews.Content: Laptop performs well. It was delivered on time in good condition. Only bad thing is it comes with Windows 8. Do not get anything with windows 8 installed. It sucks. If I had known how bad it is I would never have bought a computer with Windows 8. I am looking in to downgrading to Windows 7. It will cost me another hundred dollars, but will probably be worth that to get rid of this crap operating system.

Reviews.Title: Horrible laptop...worst ever!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: By far the worst laptop I have ever purchased.Combine Windows 8 with a disappearing CD drive that is not even recognized as a device or drive most of the time and it makes you want to throw this thing out the window. Also have problems with bank sites and Netflix among others, but I think this may be a Windows 8 issue.Samsung support initially misdiagnosed the CD problem and now the only option is to send this thing to their service center for repair which will probably be at least a two week turnaround. And they are not responsible for any data loss or any shipping materials to get it to them. So buy your own flash drive and back everything up and then send it off to Texas. So I am still out of pocket even though this machine is under warranty.If I wasn't so cheap, I would just take the loss and buy another.Never. Never, Never buying a Samsung product again.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this model if you need Intel Wireless Display
Reviews.Author: Haiwei Fan
Reviews.Content: I bought this machine to integrate with my Smart TV using Intel Wireless Display. Having spent $700and two weekends, I have no luck.I have checked out the website of both Samsung and Intel, which confirms that this model and CPU chips  support Intel WIDI. After receiving the machine, I noticed that the WIDI software wasn't installed. When I tried to download it from the Intel website, I got an error message that this platform is not compatible with WIDI.Talking to the Samsung online help, who insisted that the machine supports WIDI. They even sendme a link to prove it. I was given the instruction to re-install all kind of the softwares again.It didn't work.Ruby: [...]After searching on the Intel support forum, I found that it requires all three Intel components:CPU, graphic card and wireless card to support the WIDI. This machine has two Intel components:CPU and graphic card. Its wireless card is not compatible with Wireless Display.The Samsung repair center confirmed what I have found. However they don't consider it a defectsince there is a wireless card installed in the machine even if the machine can't do WIDIas they claim on their website. I will have to wait for them to get back to me.Very disappointed and frustrated with Samsung. I am used to the capability to return a product if it doesn't work. In my case, the vendor refused to take it back since it is open. The manufacturerefuse to recognize the defect.

Reviews.Title: Very good product.
Reviews.Author: Magic33
Reviews.Content: The product is great, work fast and full.Come to my house in good time.We have not problems with anythings.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Series 3 with characteristics of Series 5,
Reviews.Author: Luis Acosta
Reviews.Content: Samsung Series 3 with characteristics of Series 5, if they check the new settings. I recommend it widely, just as remark work best with Microsoft Windows 7, the screen is not touch

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Blake
Reviews.Content: Works great, looks great, and feels great to use.  Still getting used to windows 8 though, I wish it had an option to come with windows 7.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Maria Samol
Reviews.Content: So good I am thinking about buying another one...the deliver service was so good...really fast by the time I called my nephew to let him know it was sent ...he was already online!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: S. Martin
Reviews.Content: No problems so far and I don't see any future problems. I love my purchase and I plan to have this computer for many years!

Reviews.Title: Packs a hard punch for an economy computer
Reviews.Author: meathead1986
Reviews.Content: Samsung has come out swinging with this puppy.Purchased this from best buy during an open box sale (250$) so I got a steal on this thing.  Initial build quality is what you'd expect from a budget laptop (very plasticy, you can push down where the speakers are almost a 1/4" and there is some flex to it when you close it). I was a little skeptical when purchasing but for the price i couldn't walk away.I'm glad i did because the moment i booted it up it ran beautifully (even with windows 8). we purchased an Ativ 4 for my wife at the same time and wound up returning hers for reasons but this one cranks out whatever I've thrown at it so far and we love it.  Space is great with 750GB of storage and I'm assuming as long as you don't load it up the response time will stay as great as it is new.  Would highly reccomend for a schooling computer and maybe some light gaming or something... great buy so pick one up if you can.

Reviews.Title: Great machine
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I would buy another.  Samsungs always seem to have the best price for the features offered.Only downside is they tend to have shorter battery life.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for a good price.
Reviews.Author: Heejoon
Reviews.Content: I've had this computer for three months so far. I have no complaints about it. For a cheap price, this is an excellent product. A lot of bloatware, but that can all be uninstalled with ease.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop, Use With Caution!
Reviews.Author: NickFossil
Reviews.Content: Cons: touch pad placement, sound, bios firmware (none affect my rating).Pros: lightweight, qwerty keys, quality materials.---Touch pad placement is not symmetrical.Number pad forces right hand wrist to stay tilted to the left as you type & avoid touch pad below.On-board speakers are designed for basic system alert/notification sounds.Brick Alert!!!: If purchased w/Win 8 & considering dual boot/alternative OS options, change UEFI boot in BIOS to CSM mode.Retailer spec max memory at 8GB - Alt spec same model laptops as per Samsung can take up to 16GB. I'm currently running 12GB (4+8) on mine.Takes to Linux well - 2 or 3 keyboard shortcuts don't work properly. Battery mode always shows battery low notification.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Worst laptop I have ever owned. Windows 8 is terrible, but I speak of the laptop itself.- Some sort of RAM latency issue not inherent in Windows 8 must stem from faulty hardware installation.- The CD-ROM drive wants to open up on the slightest contact, and is touchy.For half the price this would be okay. At this price, no dice.

Reviews.Title: Angel is the best !!!
Reviews.Author: Marcelo G.
Reviews.Content: Let's be just and honest... They have an unbeatable price, it is exactly what is described, it got here FASTER than expected, thanks to Angel (she is the best) - I emailed customer support and mention that my actual laptop was basically gone and asked if they could ship ASAP and in a couple of hours I got and email from Angel saying that it was on the way already !!!Tiger Direct is by far, I mean BY FAR, my first option from now on.... Thanks once again, it is working great and an amazing price... It has bluetooth that I use a lot, 750 GB HD, 6 GB, Core i5 and win 8 (I prefer win 7) to install win 7 you have to go to Samsung website and read through, since there is a change on the Bios...So I DON'T UNDERSTAND any review with less than 5 Stars....!!!Thanks Tiger Direct and special thanks to Angel...

Intel Core i5-3210M 2.5GHz Processor with Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 up to 3.1GHz
3MB Cache
6GB DDR3 1600MHz SDRAM
750GB 5400RPM SATA Hard Drive
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Series 3 NP350V5C-A01US 15.6" Core i5 750GB HDD Laptop(Titan_sliver)
